website_summaries.verdict: For easy automatic snapshots of still subjects in good lighting, the Nikon Coolpix L24 is sufficient. If you need more than that, don't bother.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix L24 is an affordable, easy-to-use compact with a 3-inch LCD that produces photos with pleasing color under the right conditions
cons: The L24 has a mediocre lens, fewer shooting options than competing models, too little control over results, and slow shooting performance

customer_reviews.title: "I GOT WHAT I PAID FOR"
customer_reviews.text: This camera can take some good pictures, but not all the time. I have missed some good photo opertunities. I took pictures of the fireworks on the 4th of July and they turned out good. I have trouble getting action pictures unless it is on the continuous picture mode. I am not sure if any other camera for the price is going to be any better. I think maybe I should have paid more and gotten a better camera. This is our 2nd cool pics camera. The 1st one lasted almost 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix camera is cool.
customer_reviews.text: This camera for the price is everything its advertised to be and more. For a point and shoot the images are very good. With the adjustable pixel setting you have control over quality as well as quantity of images with this little gem. We would say great buy for a travel camera.
customer_reviews.author: F. B.

customer_reviews.title: lost batteries
customer_reviews.text: I have this been using this camera for several month, it takes great pictues, easy to use, but the battery compartment will not stay CLOSED. No matter where it is the battery cover will come open, you lose the batteries. Thankfully they are just AA, and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable inexpensive camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my mother, who wanted a very simple, inexpensive digital camera. As expected, she hardly uses it, but she had little trouble learning it, and it takes reasonably good photos.
customer_reviews.author: BarbK

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: nikon is an excellent brand even for light equipment like this, very handy camera, easy to handle and very durable, no cons at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Ortiz Estupi

customer_reviews.title: NIKON Coolpix L24
customer_reviews.text: Our original Nikon camera broke and we needed a quick replacement while it was being repaired. We ordered the L24 because of the low price ($85)and immediate availability. What a surprise ! it is a great camera. Small enough to carry around, 14.2 megapixels, excellent screen visibility andvery easy to use. We have our more expensive camera back but now carry the L24 with us wherever we go ! Great purchase for sure!
customer_reviews.author: T. S. Borek

customer_reviews.title: Long term let down
customer_reviews.text: I have written an initial review and wanted to express my dissatisfaction again with this camera. I have used the camera only a few times ( last time I used this camera was 4 mos. ago). I bought this camera one year ago.I know that any sort of warranty has expired but I would like to forewarn any other buyers to avoid this seller or be careful when purchasing used items on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LMcKeon

customer_reviews.title: The len does not Open
customer_reviews.text: I have this camera for about a week. I took 10 photos and after that the lens can not open .I changed batteries remove card but it seem like a mechanical defect.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: POOR DESIGN....
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera except the battery holder door latch broke very quickly. NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L. Bursten

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone as gift or just for yourself.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my 16 year old. The ease of this camera is great, put batteries in and start snapping. The pictures are great and for the price is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Latham

customer_reviews.title: NIKON COOLPIX L24 14 MP DIGITAL CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased as a Christmas gift, and has not been put into service as yet. I and my Grandaughter both have the L22 model of this camera, and we are quite satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Schlumpf

customer_reviews.title: Carol
customer_reviews.text: We consider this Nikon Coolpix L24 to be among the very best cameras we ever owned. We have had other brands but find the Nikon Coolpix the best bang for our buck. Simple to use and great pictures. Each member of our household owns a Nikon and loves it. I can't say enough about how great Amazon is, we receive outstanding service and do a great deal of purchasing with them. Service, dependability and response is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Crap
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for a vacation trip. Used it for four days and the camera froze on me. When I turn it on, the image in the LCD looks like a bullet has been shot through it and it just clicks. When I called Nikon technical services they suggested that I take the batteries and storage device from the camera for 24 hours. Still on vacation, four more days remaining and I do not have a working camera. Can't wait to return it to Amazon and believe me, I will stear clear of Nikon products in the future. Bummer of vacation when photos can't be made to remember scenery.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Bought today, returning tomorrow
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been asking for a simple video camera for quite awhile. After reading complaints repeatedly listing a weak battery door and Nikon's poor customer service, I am returning the Nikon Coolpix L-24 I bought her today. I don't think Nikon deserves my business if they treat other customers so poorly. Apparently Nikon Quality Control is no longer what it used to be and the number of complaints I've seen is statistically way too high. I'll checkout what Canon offers instead.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME camera!
customer_reviews.text: Replacement camera for an HP with 5MP (old!) that I dropped in the water...this camera is used for work and personal and works so well and takes the absolute BEST pics--easy to use too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Bo Beri

customer_reviews.title: good camera but the battery door is defective
customer_reviews.text: Good little camera, but we are one of the many who had the battery door break. I think it's time for Nikon to admit thier error. Buy another camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX L24 14 MP Digital Camera with 3.6x NIKKOR Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD (Silver) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverFROM THE MANUFACTURER


CAPTURE LIFE'S BEST MOMENTS.
DON’T MISS THE MOMENT.
Birthdays. Weddings. Baby’s first steps. With the COOLPIX L24, it's never been easier to keep these memories alive. This compact camera makes it simple to shoot clear photos and movies that you can e-mail, post on a family website or print and frame at home.

With the COOLPIX L24, it’s easy to capture life's most precious moments. The Scene Mode system lets you choose from 16 scenes to find the best one for your situation, or you can rely on the Easy Auto Mode to automatically select the best settings for your photos. You'll also catch unforgettable facial expressions with Nikon's Smart Portrait System, which includes a Blink Warning that alerts you when your subject may have blinked; in-camera Red-Eye Fix™ technology that automatically corrects red eye; and Face-Priority that focuses on up to 12 faces.

This affordable, lightweight camera is easy to carry and requires easy-to-find AA batteries.

POWERFUL. AFFORDABLE. UNBEATABLE!
The palm-sized COOLPIX L24 is as powerful as it is affordable. It boasts 14-megapixel recording for razor-sharp photos that will retain their detail on prints as large as 16x20 inches. Plus, a 3.6x optical Zoom-NIKKOR® glass lens features a zoom range from 37mm to 134mm, so you can capture an entire graduation class as easily as you can your favorite graduate.

Zoom range from 37mm to 134mm. The COOLPIX L24 makes it a breeze to shoot quality photos and movies. It has a bright, three-inch LCD monitor so it's easy to see the screen, shoot your picture, and share it with friends. Its three-way Vibration Reduction (VR) Image Stabilization System minimizes the streaky images that result from shots taken with shaky hands. Its motion detector identifies moving subjects and then adjusts the camera's settings to catch the action, so you’re sure to capture a sandlot player's game-saving catch or first bike ride.

Large 3” LCD Display MEMORIES THAT MOVE—AND MOVE YOU.
Sometimes a still picture can't preserve a memory like a moving image. School plays. Piano recitals. A child's first words. For moments like these, the COOLPIX L24 shoots TV quality movies—complete with sound—at 30fps with 640x480 resolution. It's never been simpler to capture life's most special moments, and it's never been easier to relive them because you can watch them on the camera's LCD, your TV or your home computer screen.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * COOLPIX L24 Digital Camera
 * Strap
 * UC-E6 USB Cable
 * Two AA Alkaline Batteries
 * Nikon View NX 2 CD-ROM
feature_bullets: 3.6x Optical Zoom-NIKKOR Glass Lens for sharp clear pictures
Big, Bright 3.0-inch LCD for easy viewing and sharing
Easy Auto Mode simply point and shoot
High Quality TV Movies with Sound

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
